name: Remothered: Tormented Fathers
description: Remothered: Tormented Fathers is the pure and realistic survival horror videogame
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: Quad-core Intel i7 or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
